explanation.rules:
Insert tV- before CV0:
If (V0 ∈ {e, i, o, u} and C = y) or (V0 ∈ {e, i} and C ∉ {b, m, w, y}), then V = i
If (V0 ∈ {ɛ, ɔ, ɪ, ʊ, a} and C = y) or (V0 ∈ {ɛ, ɪ} and C ∉ {b, m, w, y}), then V = ɪ
If (V0 ∈ {e, i, o, u} and C = ∈ {b, m, w}) or (V0 ∈ {o, u} and C ∉ {b, m, w, y}), then V = u
If (V0 ∈ {ɛ, ɔ, ɪ, ʊ, a} and C = ∈ {b, m, w}) or (V0 ∈ {ɔ, ʊ, a} and C ∉ {b, m, w, y}), then V = ʊ
if V0 is nasalized (Ṽ0), then V gets nasalized
If CV0 is in high tone (CV́0), then both tV and CV0 get high tone (tV́-CV́0)
If CV0 is in falling tone (CV̂0), then tV gets high tone and CV0 gets low tone (tV́-CV̀0)
If CV0 is in low tone (CV̀0), then both tV and CV0 get low tone (tV̀-CV̀0)
N-CV0 (N ∈ {m, n, ɲ, ŋ}) becomes n-tV-CV0
